Morgan Cosmetics Rose Water Triple Strength (2019 formulation)

Brand: Morgan Cosmetics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water
book: 0884-Morgan Cosmetics Rose Water Triple Strength (2019 formulation)

chunk: Directions: This pure Rose Water is the hydrosol from distilled Damascus Rose Petals that grow in the Morocco’s “Valley of Roses”. This pure rose water is excellent for any type of skin including dry or inflamed skin as an astringent and skin toner; it will also help to restore moisture balance and diminish broken capillaries.
